title: The Quickening
description: Where there is magicthere are those who listenand those who are calledAmong us walk a race older than time--the Travelers. Such are Hunter and Brighid, Black Annis, Willie, Raven, and many others. Shapeshifters and dreamers, the fey, the hidden, and the lost, the Travelers are here now, called to New Rathmore to do battle against Michael Blacker and his fanatical followers who are intent on igniting a modern day Inquisition. On an unforgettable night of mayhem and murder, Kathryn meets the magical Travelers, is awakened to her true fey nature, and must choose sides in an all-out war between the world as she knows it and the world she had forgotten.Cover painting Â© Jonathan Hunt
author: Ly de Angeles
